duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare, process, and move merchandise productively and accurately according to established guidelines to meet department standards.
Work independently and in a team, as assigned, and move between job functions as needed.
Practice safety awareness; order consolidation, picking, packing, replenishment, shipping, receiving, inventorying, and re-warehousing.
Provide and process information in response to inquiries, concerns, and/or requests about products and services.
Have a basic understanding of current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMPs).
